post.summary: Subscribe an existing team to a tournament
post.description: This endpoint subscribe an already existing team into a specified tournament by the team's name and the tournament's name.It's a convenient way to add a team that is already registered in the system to a new or existing tournament without having to recreate the team from scratch.

post.summary: Create and subscribe a new team to a tournament
post.description: This endpoint creates a new team based on the provided TeamDTO information and then subscribes this newly created team to a specified tournament by the tournament's name. It facilitates the process of adding fresh teams to the tournament, streamlining their creation and immediate enrollment in a single step.
Generate semi finals for a tournament.
Generate quarter finals for a tournament.
Generate final match for a tournament.
